title: Frontend Mentor
description: Solve real-world HTML, CSS and JavaScript challenges whilst working to professional designs. Join 616,636 developers building projects, reviewing code, and helping each other get better.

title: CodePen Challenges
description: Challenges are fun opportunities for leveling up your skills by building things. Each week, youll get a new prompt surrounding a monthly theme to riff on. The best Pens get picked and featured on the homepage!

title: Codier io
description: Explore and attempt front-end coding challenges.
